comment.author: 50728681@N06
comment._content: The gal with the smoke makes it.

comment.author: 72718192@N00
comment._content: Is the man on the right wearing in beige tartan trousers? I remember the 70's, not good. The woman on the left with the fag does not place the picture in time, but it is the 'hip man about town' on the right (Bangs More Buzz at Burton's?). In Sheffield, where I live, old ladies, like the one on the left existed well in to the late 1980's especially in the markets.
